splashScreenConsent:

mainScreenDailyBonusTutorial: Collect the [Daily Bonus] from the shop
notificationComeBackBody: It's not the same without you, let's solve some puzzles! 😜
notificationComeBackGiftBody: Here's a little help from us to boost your progress! ⚡
notificationComeBackGift2Body: You're doing great! Use this boost to level up!
notificationLivesEmptyBody: Collect from the bank & continue the fun!
notificationLevelChestBody: An amazing reward is waiting for you!
notificationScheduled1Title: Sometimes you just need a break...
notificationScheduled1Body: Time to unwind, relax and play!
notificationScheduled3Body: Play a level & train your brain!
notificationScheduled4Body: Continue the fun & enjoy awesome levels!
notificationScheduled6Body: You're doing great! Play now & boost your skills!
notificationScheduled7Title: Looking for something FUN to do?
notificationScheduled7Body: So many cool challenges are waiting! Play a level NOW!
notificationScheduled8Body: Spend a relaxing fun time, finding all the objects!
notificationScheduled9Title: Here's how to make your day better...
notificationScheduled9Body: Hit PLAY & continue the fun adventure!
notificationScheduled10Body: Show your skills & reach the level goal!
notificationEndlessSaleFreeBody: There are FREE rewards to be collected! Come back.
notificationTeamChestNextEventBody: Join your team and collect keys for awesome rewards!
notificationTeamChestEndEventBody: Join your team and collect the remaining keys!
notificationTeamBattleNextEventBody: Join your team and become a champion!
notificationTeamBattleEndEventBody: Join your team and make it to the top!
notificationPictureEventNextEventBody: A new renovation event has started. We need you!
notificationPictureEventEndEventBody: The renovation event ends in 3 days, you can do this!
notificationDecorationEventNextEventBody: Our latest makeover event just kicked off. Can't wait to see your creativity in action!
notificationDecorationEventEndEventBody: Only 2 days left for the makeover challenge. Make your finishing touches and collect the reward!
quitConfirmationPopupBody: Are you sure you want to exit?
levelQuitConfirmationPopupBody: Are you sure you want to quit?
livesBankPopupBody: Collect rewards to find extra lives!
livesBankAskLivesBody:
You don't have any extra lives!
Get free lives from your team members.
userSupportFeedbackPopupTextError: Code is incorrect. Please try again.
rateUsPopupBody: How are you enjoying the game?
feedbackPopupTitle: We would love to hear your feedback!
notEnoughBoostersPopupMagnetBody: Pulls a goal item and collects it
notEnoughBoostersPopupHintBody: Hints on a goal item's location
notEnoughBoostersPopupSuperHintBody: Reveals the location of 3 goal items
preGameBoostersBuyPopupChargedFanBody: Start with the Fan fully charged!
timeUpPopupSegmentedSaleExtra: Free Extra Time For This Level!
inAppPurchaseOfferPopupBody2: You can still watch ads to earn rewards if you prefer.
dailyBonusPopupText: Collect all 6 days to open the grand prize!
dailyBonusBundleDontLoseProgressText:
Don't lose your progress!
Open gifts each day and claim the grand prize!
targetedAdsConsentPopupBody:
By playing our game, you confirm you accept our <link>Terms of Service</link> and <link>Privacy Policy</link>.

This app uses targeted advertising. Click 'Accept' to confirm you agree for us to share your data with our partners, so you get personalized ads. You can change your selection later in the game's settings. Find out more about our partners and how we use your data in our <link>Privacy Policy</link>.
targetedAdsRewardedVideoPopupBody: In order to earn extra rewards by watching an ad we need to share your data with our partners so you get personalized ads. Click 'Accept' to confirm you agree for us to share your data with our partners. You can change your selection later in the game's settings. Find out more about our partners and how we use your data in our <link>Privacy Policy</link>.
storePopupConnectionErrorBody: Please make sure you are connected to the Internet.
fourthOfJulySalePopupBody: Get the multiplier and double your rewards for an hour!
laborDaySalePopupBody: Get the multiplier and double your rewards for an hour!
halloweenSalePopupBody: Get the multiplier and double your rewards for an hour!
thanksgivingSalePopupBody: Get the multiplier and double your rewards for an hour!
christmasSalePopupBody: Get the multiplier and double your rewards for an hour!

mothersDaySalePopupBody: Get the multiplier and double your rewards for an hour!
preGamePopupHaveUnlimitedSuperLightning: You will start levels with Super Lightning until the time runs out!
preGamePopupHaveUnlimitedExtraTime: You will start levels with Extra Time until the time runs out!
preGamePopupHaveUnlimitedChargedFan: You will start levels with Charged Fan until the time runs out!
tutorialBasicGameplay: Collect the items that appear on [Goal Cards]
tutorialCollect: Collect the remaining items until the goal is complete!
tutorialShuffle: Tap the charged [Fan] to shuffle and find hidden items!
tutorialMagnet: Tap the [Magnet] to instantly collect an item
tutorialHint: The [Light Bulb] shows the area in which to look
tutorialSuperHint: The [Magnifying Glass] marks 3 goal items. Give it a try!
tutorialFreezeTime: [Freeze Time] will stop the timer and any active elements for a short while
tutorialSuperLightning: Start the game with a [Lightning Storm] to get rid of 10 junk items!
tutorialChargedFan: Gain an edge by starting the game with the [Fan] charged and ready!
tutorialExtraTime: Careful, this level is hard! Use the [Clock] to get extra time!
tutorialLightningBolt: Collect the [Lightning Bolt] to destroy 3 unneeded items
tutorialClock: Collect the [Clock] to get extra time
tutorialGarbageBin: Collect the [Trash Can] before it fills the level with stinky garbage!
tutorialColorBomb: Collect the [Ink Bomb] before it explodes!
tutorialGem: Find and collect [Gems] to complete the [Gem Challenge]!
tutorialWeekly: Collect the [Weekly Item] to win rewards!
tutorialCrate: Drag or throw a [Crate] at the screen's edge to break it
tutorialDuplicator: Collect the [Toy Mice] before they duplicate!
tutorialEliminator: If you find an item with lightning effect, be sure to collect it!
tutorialSmallChest: Drag a [Key] to the [Treasure Chest] to open it!
tutorialFanCharger: Collect a [Fan Charger] to charge the fan booster immediately!
tutorialCage: All goal items are locked! Drag a [Cage] to the collector to break it!
tutorialEnlarger: Collect the [Magic Mushroom] to make a goal item grow!
tutorialLargeChest: This chest has [3 Keys]! Drag them all to the keyholes to open it!
tutorialMysteryBox: [Mystery Boxes] might contain beneficial items! Try collecting them!
tutorialShrinker: The [Shrink Potion] will shrink 5 junk items! Try collecting one!
tutorialSpammer: One of these [Spammers] shoots goal items! Try to collect only the bad ones!
tutorialMeteorStrike: Collect one of the [Fireballs] to trigger a [Meteor Strike] and destroy junk items!
tutorialPinata: [Piñatas]! Drop the [Bat] over a piñata to break it and find out what's inside!
tutorialDynamite: Collect the [Detonator] to make the [Dynamite] go BOOM!
tutorialLaserBeam: Collect the [Laser Gun] for some pew pew action!
tutorialCometShower: Collect this [Comet Shard] to start a [Comet Shower] and destroy junk!
gemChallengePopupMission: Collect {0} more gems to unlock the next reward!
coinChallengePopupMission: Collect {0} more coins in levels to open the safe!

pictureEvent01TutorialText: We need to renovate this coffee house. Let's <#FFEA04>fix</color> the floor.
pictureEvent02TutorialText: This camp is in shambles, but we can <#FFEA04>restore</color> it in no time!
pictureEvent03TutorialText: The park might not be in the best shape right now, but we can quickly <#FFEA04>transform</color> it into a wonderful spot for a <#FFEA04>picnic</color>.
pictureEvent03ExtendPopupBody: The <#FEE92C>Sunny Picnic</color> event is over! Extend the event by <#FEE92C>{0} MORE DAYS</color> and complete the scene!
pictureEvent03ExtendPopupBodyAlmost: The <#FEE92C>Sunny Picnic</color> event is almost over! Extend the event by <#FEE92C>{0} MORE DAYS</color> and complete the scene!
pictureEvent04TutorialText: This neglected <#FFEA04>Play Corner</color> yearns for a <#FFEA04>makeover</color>, with toys and crafts to breathe new life into the space.

easterChainSaleShareText: Happy Easter! May this special day bring you all the blessings of the season. I am celebrating by picking Easter eggs in Find 3D, my favorite game! If you haven’t tried it yet, download the game and join the fun! {0}
mothersDayChainSaleShareText: Sending Mother’s Day wishes to all the amazing moms! If you need a break, take some time to relax and play Find 3D - my go-to for a fun and challenging break. Enjoy your special day! {0}
laborDayChainSaleShareText: Happy Labor Day! May this day be a well-deserved break from your hard work - join me  in playing Find 3D to unwind. {0}
fourthOfJulyChainSaleShareText: Happy 4th of July! Enjoy the fireworks, celebrate freedom, and create unforgettable memories with your loved ones. If you need to spark your day, join my favorite game - Find 3D! {0}
halloweenChainSaleShareText: Happy Halloween! The candy is at hand, and the house is decorated. It’s time to jump back into Find 3D!: {0}
thanksgivingChainSaleShareText: Happy Thanksgiving, everyone! The turkey is carved, and the pie is finished, so let’s all jump into Find 3D: {0}
birthdayEventBodyDay0: Celebrate with us by returning every day for the next [8 days] to receive a special gift [each day!]
birthdayEventBodyDay1: It's day one of our [countdown!] Collect this gift from us, only [7 days] left for our big celebration!
